# mlr3fairness: Fairness Pipeline Operators

All the debiasing methods cannot be independent and has to be used with the learners. For the convinience of the users, we provide all the debiasing methods encapsulated as Pipeline Operators. The way to use those pipeline operators are as simple as some popular packages like `tidyverse` or `dplyr`. Below we will show some examples.

# Introduction to this vignette.
